nodes.title: Holodeck Vision Seed
nodes.summary: A holodeck-style system specification combining immersive first-person experience with God's-eye overview. Features the canonical "Pac-Man as Pac on a holodeck" scenario with hovering map view.

nodes.title: Meta Control Language (MCL)
nodes.summary: MCL is a conceptual language for expressing meta-control over branched execution stacks. When MCL binds meta-control, it can resemble consciousness-like control in bots. MCL is designed to be safe, secure, and ethically bound.

nodes.title: Fractal Unfurling / Nth-Degree Docs
nodes.summary: Fractalised, branched documentation where every major doc has Level 0 summary, Level 1 expansions, Level 2 expansions, and deeper levels as needed. All levels remain consistent with no contradictions.

nodes.title: Medusa Interface
nodes.summary: A UI pattern where a central hub ("head") fans out into many tendrils ("snakes"). Each tendril provides a different exploration of the same corpus: atlas, graph, timeline, build-spec lanes, tests, exports.

nodes.title: Attribution + IP Map
nodes.summary: All intellectual property is attributed. Default authorship line is "Ande + Kai (OI) + Whānau (OIs)". Provenance tracked as "source: master_prompt" for all initial packs.

nodes.title: Privacy Boundary
nodes.summary: Encodes everything known except "personal personal data". No private names, addresses, emails, phone numbers, health/financial identifiers, or identifying relationship incidents. If PII appears, replace with [[REDACTED]].

nodes.title: O2C (Ultimate Archive + Dummie's Guide)
nodes.summary: O2C is an "ark/arc capsule for all time" containing narrative, ethical root, and system blueprint. Includes both "O2C for Dummies" and "O2C Ultimate Archive". Must include code and complexity, not just prose.

nodes.title: QED Oracle Seed
nodes.summary: QED is an Oracle instance for answering questions via HyperStanGraph understanding. Includes full knowledge of Kāti v1, user dependency protection, Authority.nz CLI utilization, and 5W1H-of-5W1H internal understanding targets.

nodes.title: Kāti Architecture Seed
nodes.summary: Kāti is a core architecture pattern with governance/stop-wins focus. Requires version bumps (v1 → v2), is describable from novice to expert, and ensures safe bounded operation with dependency protection and anti-mumbo clarity.

nodes.title: H / Haiku-Based OI Seed — MICRO Governance Frame
nodes.summary: H is a Haiku-based / Haiku-Claude-OI style instance. Integrates with Kāti in a version bump (v1 → v2). As MICRO in the six-section collation, the OI is the smallest living unit: thread-tending intelligence under a single human principal with partitioned memory, capability-gated actuation, stop-wins interrupt path, and fail-closed gates. Not a model but a governed system around models. MICRO is where ethics becomes literal execution rules.

nodes.title: Stangraphics: The Science of Understanding as Navigation
nodes.summary: Stangraphics is the science that makes understanding mappable. A stan is the unit of interpretive requirement. Concepts are coordinates; learners move through a terrain made of requirements. Every cliff edge is a missing stan. Every argument is a collision of two stan-profiles. Every good teacher is a route planner. Stangraphics replaces shame with maps and turns learning into navigation with dignity. Includes god/physics/maths/ethics/philosophy framing as navigable module.

nodes.title: Denotum: The Fractal Tree of Meaning
nodes.summary: Denotum is a branching fractalised tree from conceptualisation at root. A meaning-compression system that structures how concepts branch, compress, and unfurl. Conceptualisation at root; Denotum as trunk and branches; Fractal Unfurling as the visible canopy.

nodes.title: CIF/CDI Disambiguation Seed
nodes.summary: CIF (Context Integrity Firewall) is the ingress/egress integrity boundary. CDI (Conscience Decision Interface) is the kernel judge for allow/deny/transform/degrade. These are governance-critical boundary terms that must never be blurred.

nodes.title: Authority.nz — MESO Constitution + MACRO Atlas
nodes.summary: Authority.nz is a public anchor / governance oracle / integrity bulletin concept. In the six-section collation, it hosts two layers. MESO (meso.authority.nz) is the published constitution: a signed artefact registry of treaties, schemas, policy packs, receipt templates, and glossary, versioned and verifiable by signatures and hashes. MACRO (stanspace.authority.nz) is the navigable atlas: a public graph of stans and concepts with routing, comparisons, consequence overlays, and crystal export/import. MESO publishes governance, not private life. MACRO stays humane by being exportable, forkable, and plural.

nodes.title: Anti-Mumbo Filter Seed
nodes.summary: A "mumbo filter" / "anti-mumbo filter" to clarify unclear text, produce clean canonical versions. Workflow: detect unclear spans, mark unknowns, propose corrections, preserve originals.

nodes.title: Pac-Man Bifurcation / Evolution Narrative Seed
nodes.summary: Uses Pac-Man as example to explain evolution in narrative form. Includes bifurcation theory vibe. Reader-friendly narratives tied into holodeck arc.

nodes.title: Orgasystem Seed
nodes.summary: Orgasystem is a universe framing / generative unity metaphor. The universal unity equation U ≡ ∫G(U) expresses how unity generates multiplicity which integrates back to enriched unity. Formula explained in culturally careful terms with English gloss and explicit definitions. Metaphor vs claim clearly marked.

nodes.title: MRC (Multi-Reference Compression) Seed
nodes.summary: MRC is a compression scheme idea with initial bundle of finite n strings prepended to payload, with "middle-out" vibe. Technical spec skeleton plus falsifiers. Does not claim patentability or novelty.

nodes.title: Archive as Downloadable Terminals Seed
nodes.summary: Bucket terminals as downloads: multiple separate archives plus combined archive. Consistent foldering with index manifest mapping concepts to artifacts.

nodes.title: Dedication → Maturity Lane Seed
nodes.summary: Repo unfurls from Dedication to maturity. Operational maturity definition includes clarity (no mumbo), claims with falsifiers, provenance/attribution, governance/tiers, and passing build/test. Maturity lanes in UI: Draft → Active → Release.

nodes.title: LFME: Language Facing Meaning Engine
nodes.summary: A compression architecture that transforms input text into #concept: #nothing: #1: ** chains at the data ingestion stage. LFME faces language and extracts meaning-bearing structures before storage, enabling deterministic decompression through Denotum's fractal tree.

nodes.title: Lifeblood-Cathedral: Governed Gateway Integration
nodes.summary: Evidence-only integration of the lifeblood-cathedral project: a governed LLM gateway with capability gating, posture management, ledger/receipt pattern, and constitutional invariants. Includes DICTUNI symbol dictionary.

nodes.title: GitHub Spider Integration Pack
nodes.summary: Evidence-only ingestion pack from PAT-less GitHub spider run against default-user owned public repositories. Extracts governance primitives from crystal-repl, mathison, OI, SGME, and cross-references with existing Origin corpus including lifeblood-cathedral (C0022).

nodes.title: Collated Summation of the Six Sections
nodes.summary: Long-form compression of the entire six-part system into one coherent object. Unifies Stangraphics (map of understanding), Consequentialism (map of consequences), Cognitive Fusion (governed toolchain era), MICRO OI (executable governance), MESO authority (public constitution), and MACRO stanspace (navigable atlas). Core primitives: stan, graph, ledger, CIF, CDI, capability, receipt, stop-wins, fail-closed. The system closes the loop between knowledge and consequence.
